divs: sighting detailsit is only one of several sightings over the years many of which occured shortly after 9\11, and more over the last 5 years. i truly believe there is a new area 51 like place in nc in or near rutherford county. i as well as my sister and brother n law and mom have all seen a solid white ball of light fly silently across the sky at dusk and at night. it is not a plane as there are no flashing lights. the entire object has a brilliant white glow to it. i have also seen 3 yellow light objects in the sky that were sitting perfectly still in the northwest sky, and fly off and disapper in seconds. i have seen (in the day time) an object which looks like a basketball flying around an airplane in the town of rutherfordton. i am willing to submit to any lie detector, hypnosis or any other test. if you came here, you would not have to stay longer than a month or maybe not that long before you would see something yourself.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Forest City
There were no other sightings in Forest City on or around September 2nd 2011
